title: How to Make Rempeyek

steps.headline: Select some Anchovies.
steps.description: For Rempenyek, first soak in water for about 20 minutes, then split into 2 anchovies if too large. If the anchovies do not need to be split, because they are already small, then leave them as they are.

steps.headline: Notice if you use a non-stick skillet or nothing, because Juka is sticky and can be destroyed when reversed.
Use enough oil so that it can cover all parts of Rempeyek and fry over low heat in batches.
Drain on a paper towel.
steps.description: If the oil is gone put into a top, once you already know about how to make peanut brittle right then the next step is practice. This is the preparation process covering what materials are needed and now to the production process. Now you are almost ready to begin.

steps.headline: Combine all ingredients, except peanuts and spice paste .
Pour a little water while stirring until all ingredients are evenly distributed .
Insert the peanuts and stir again .
Heat the oil, remember watch the small fire.
Pour the batter into the skillet with a spoon sanyur.
Pour thin and wait till it takes on a golden color.
Lift the already golden peanut brittle.
steps.description: You can store it in a jar you have.

steps.headline: The last Rempeyek is now ready to serve.

text: Preparing the Rempeyek Select some Anchovies. For Rempenyek, first soak in water for about 20 minutes, then split into 2 anchovies if too large. If the anchovies do not need to be split, because they are already small, then leave them as they are. Notice if you use a non-stick skillet or nothing, because Juka is sticky and can be destroyed when reversed.  Use enough oil so that it can cover all parts of Rempeyek and fry over low heat in batches.  Drain on a paper towel. If the oil is gone put into a top, once you already know about how to make peanut brittle right then the next step is practice. This is the preparation process covering what materials are needed and now to the production process. Now you are almost ready to begin. Cooking the Rempeyek Combine all ingredients, except peanuts and spice paste .  Pour a little water while stirring until all ingredients are evenly distributed .  Insert the peanuts and stir again .  Heat the oil, remember watch the small fire.  Pour the batter into the skillet with a spoon sanyur.  Pour thin and wait till it takes on a golden color.  Lift the already golden peanut brittle. You can store it in a jar you have. The last Rempeyek is now ready to serve.
